hero.name: Jules
hero.description: Computer Science BUT student—curious what I do? It's all right here:

about.title: A passionate developer?
about.p1: I'm good at what I do. Curious, serious, meticulous; I love problems and I love solutions even more.
about.p2: Jack of all trades, I enjoy exploring different domains and languages.
about.p3: I'm not getting replaced by AI. Believe it.

experience.title: Experience
experience.current: Apprenticeship at Dessine ton meuble/Aryga since 2025

education.title: Education
education.degree: BUT Informatique, Université Gustave Eiffel Marne-la-Vallée
education.bac: STI2D high school diploma with highest honors, Lycée Diderot Paris

mentality.title: Mentality
mentality.p1: Efficient work, autonomy, and communication—that's the key to success. And don't forget to stay hydrated.

passions.title: Passions
passions.p1: Literature ('To Your Eternity', 'BLAME', 'House of Leaves'...) my bookshelf is about to explode
passions.p2: Video games ('Monster Hunter', 'Zelda', 'Rain World', 'Dark Souls'...) my Steam library is about to explode
passions.p3: Drawing, all over the margins of my notebook :P
passions.p4: Skiing in the Alps, my well-deserved downtime

items.title: STI2D High School Diploma
items.description: At Lycée Diderot Paris, I earned my STI2D diploma with highest honors. Specialization in SIN (Information & Digital Systems). Graduated and entered the BUT Computer Science program.
sub_events: Geo-located robot project with Arduino & Raspberry Pi
Started the BUT Computer Science program

items.title: BUT Computer Science
items.description: At Université Gustave Eiffel Marne-la-Vallée, I'm currently in the BUT Computer Science program. Building skills in development, programming, databases, and project management (we even had law classes, send help).
sub_events: Skipped a week of classes to go to Zanzibar (not proud)

items.title: Internship then Apprenticeship
items.description: At Dessine ton meuble/Aryga - Web application developer. Learning how to work with AI tools (they don't teach that in school).

items.title: Engineering school
items.description: Continuing studies in engineering school, and then I get rich—that's the plan...

projects.title: My
projects.description: A selection of my most significant achievements, from university projects to enterprise builds.
